pages.text: $(li)The Spiked Scute is a hard item that can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:armors/spiked_turtle_shell)Spiked Turtle Shell$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can only be obtained by shearing an $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/alligator_snapping)Alligator Snapping Turtle$(/l) covered in $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/kelp)Kelp$(/l) after staying underwated for too long.
